articles.title: U.S. ruling quarters' remarks under fire
Preparatory committee inaugurated in Switzerland
Press statement on commemorating Sun's Day released
articles.content:
Preparatory committee inaugurated in Switzerland 
    Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Swiss committee for supporting Korea's reunification and the cultural information center on the DPRK in Lausanne, Switzerland, released on march 10 a press statement saying a preparatory committee was inaugurated in Switzerland  to commemorate Sun's Day, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung,  and it set the period of commemorating sun's day from April 1 to 15 during which commemorations would be held. 
 The chairman of the Swiss committee for supporting Korea's reunification was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
